text: Gilbert Gets Tiger-Itis is a 1915 British silent short comedy film directed by Maurice Elvey and starring Fred Groves and Elisabeth Risdon.Murphy p.179 ==Cast== * Fred Groves as Gilbert * Elisabeth Risdon as Mrs. Gilbert ==References== ==Bibliography== * Murphy, Robert. Directors in British and Irish Cinema: A Reference Companion. British Film Institute, 2006. ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:British films Category:British comedy films Category:British silent short films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Maurice Elvey Category:1915 comedy films Category:British black-and-white films
title: Gilbert Gets Tiger-It is
